animeTitle: My Beloved Wife Is Actually the Villain
otherNames: Jiao Qi Jing Shi Da Fan Pai, Jiāo Qī Jìng Shì Dà Fǎn Pài, Kiều Thê Là Đại Phản Phái, My Beloved Wife Is Actually the Villain, Nương Tử Nhà Ta Vậy Mà Là Nhân Vật Phản Diện, 娇妻竟是大反派
synopsis: Just as I entered the novel's world, I unexpectedly became the cannon fodder male character Mo Yaolang, and even married the villain BOSS as my wife? As cannon fodder, not only do I have to redeem my villainous wife to prevent her from turning evil, but I also have to seize the protagonist's fate. Mo Yaolang smiled faintly. Although I have no cultivation, the system has given me an endless supply of item cards and rare treasures, enough to stand at the pinnacle of this continent. The so-called 'child of destiny' is nothing more than an ant that can be crushed in the palm of my hand!
